lines.text: Fathom, eh? I never met a Fathom. Where did you ever get a kinky name like that?
First initials for uncles- Freddy, Arthur, Tom, Harry, Oscar, Milton. They were all rich, and Papa wasn't taking any chances- unlike me.
The name's Fathom Harvill.
Fathom? How'd you get a name like Fathom?
It's short for Elizabeth.
Please sit down, Miss...?
Harvill. Fathom Harvill. Please don't ask me how I got the name Fathom.
Let me guess. Your father wanted a very tall son. Or you were named after wealthy relatives. Or as a child, you were very deep.
Two out of three, that's not bad.

[joking with Fathom]
I believe you're kidding on the square.
Señorita, how did you ever get a name like Fathom?
A fathom is six feet. Papa was hoping for a tall son. Papa was disappointed.
I don't make a habit of murdering people I haven't been introduced to.
"Men on the make can go jump in the lake."
The next jumpsuit I order won't have a zipper!

[Watching the body of Col Campbell fall to the ground]
Sorry about that, Guv'ner.

[Recognising the serial number Peter has just read out]
Hey - that's my passport number!

[Looking at Fathom's passport]
You know, your picture doesn't do you justice!

[to Fathom]
Amazing what fish you can pull out of the sea if you're patient!

[Spotting Merriwether in the helicopter]
Keep following, chum - Col Campbell has a nice reception committee waiting for you!

[while watching Fathom running away from the bull]
I love this world!
Then why do you want to blow it up?
Isn't that a little melodramatic?
What do you call H-Bombs - light comedy?
[Starts running again]
H-Bombs? How did H-Bombs get into this cosy chat?
She's killed my missus!

[Pulling Fathom into the train compartment]
Someone's turning you into a piegon - carrier type!
